verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

שְׁלַח־ <WH7971> Send לְךָ֣ אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> thou men וְיָתֻ֙רוּ֙ <WH8446> that they may search אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am נֹתֵ֖ן <WH5414> which I give לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of every אֶחָד֩ <WH259> a man אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> A man אֶחָ֜ד <WH259> a לְמַטֵּ֤ה <WH4294> tribe אֲבֹתָיו֙ <WH1> of their fathers תִּשְׁלָ֔חוּ <WH7971> shall ye send כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> every נָשִׂ֥יא <WH5387> every one a ruler בָהֶֽם׃

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> sent אֹתָ֥ם <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses מִמִּדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> them from the wilderness פָּארָ֖ן <WH6290> of Paran עַל־ <WH5921> at פִּ֣י <WH6310> by the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כֻּלָּ֣ם <WH3605> all אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> men רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> heads בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> [were]

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁמוֹתָ֑ם <WH8034> And these [were] their names לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֔ן <WH7205> of Reuben שַׁמּ֖וּעַ <WH8051> Shammua בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זַכּֽוּר׃ <WH2139> of Zaccur
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> Of the tribe שִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon שָׁפָ֖ט <WH8202> Shaphat בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חוֹרִֽי׃ <WH2753> of Hori
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> Of the tribe יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah כָּלֵ֖ב <WH3612> Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְפֻנֶּֽה׃ <WH3312> of Jephunneh
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> Of the tribe יִשָּׂשכָ֔ר <WH3485> of Issachar יִגְאָ֖ל <WH3008> Igal בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> of Joseph
לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> Of the tribe אֶפְרָ֖יִם <WH669> of Ephraim הוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <WH1954> Oshea בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נֽוּן׃ <WH5126> of Nun
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> Of the tribe בִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> of Benjamin פַּלְטִ֖י <WH6406> Palti בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רָפֽוּא׃ <WH7505> of Raphu
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> Of the tribe זְבוּלֻ֔ן <WH2074> of Zebulun גַּדִּיאֵ֖ל <WH1427> Gaddiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son סוֹדִֽי׃ <WH5476> of Sodi

לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> Of the tribe יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> of Joseph לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> [namely] of the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> of Manasseh גַּדִּ֖י <WH1426> Gaddi בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son סוּסִֽי׃ <WH5485> of Susi
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> Of the tribe דָ֔ן <WH1835> of Dan עַמִּיאֵ֖ל <WH5988> Ammiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גְּמַלִּֽי׃ <WH1582> of Gemalli
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> Of the tribe אָשֵׁ֔ר <WH836> of Asher סְת֖וּר <WH5639> Sethur בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מִיכָאֵֽל׃ <WH4317> of Michael
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> Of the tribe נַפְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> of Naphtali נַחְבִּ֖י <WH5147> Nahbi בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son וָפְסִֽי׃ <WH2058> of Vophsi
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> Of the tribe גָ֔ד <WH1410> of Gad גְּאוּאֵ֖ל <WH1345> Geuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מָכִֽי׃ <WH4352> of Machi

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> These [are] the names הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> of the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> which Moses לָת֣וּר <WH8446> to spy out אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> called מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses לְהוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <WH1954> Oshea בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נ֖וּן <WH5126> of Nun יְהוֹשֻֽׁעַ׃ <WH3091> Jehoshua

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent אֹתָם֙ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses לָת֖וּר <WH8446> them to spy out אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> to עֲל֥וּ <WH5927> unto them Get you up זֶה֙ <WH2088> there בַּנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> this [way] southward וַעֲלִיתֶ֖ם <WH5927> and go up אֶת־ <WH853> הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> into the mountain

וּרְאִיתֶ֥ם <WH7200> And see אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land מַה־ <WH4100> what הִ֑וא <WH1931> he וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעָם֙ <WH5971> what it [is] and the people הַיֹּשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> that dwelleth עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and הֶחָזָ֥ק <WH2389> therein whether they [be] strong הוּא֙ <WH1931> he הֲרָפֶ֔ה <WH7504> or weak הַמְעַ֥ט <WH4592> few ה֖וּא <WH1931> he אִם־ <WH518> or רָֽב׃ <WH7227> or many

וּמָ֣ה <WH4100> How הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> And what the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הוּא֙ <WH1931> they יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> [is] that they dwell in בָּ֔הּ הֲטוֹבָ֥ה <WH2896> whether it [be] good הִ֖וא <WH1931> he אִם־ <WH518> or רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> or bad וּמָ֣ה <WH4100> How הֶֽעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> and what cities אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הוּא֙ <WH1931> they יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> [they be] that they dwell בָּהֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> in הַבְּמַֽחֲנִ֖ים <WH4264> whether in tents אִ֥ם <WH518> or בְּמִבְצָרִֽים׃ <WH4013> or in strong holds

וּמָ֣ה <WH4100> How הָ֠אָרֶץ <WH776> And what the land הַשְּׁמֵנָ֨ה <WH8082> [is] whether it [be] fat הִ֜וא <WH1931> he אִם־ <WH518> or רָזָ֗ה <WH7330> or lean הֲיֵֽשׁ־ <WH3426> whether there be בָּ֥הּ עֵץ֙ <WH6086> wood אִם־ <WH518> or אַ֔יִן <WH369> not וְהִ֨תְחַזַּקְתֶּ֔ם <WH2388> therein or not And be ye of good courage וּלְקַחְתֶּ֖ם <WH3947> and bring מִפְּרִ֣י <WH6529> of the fruit הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְהַ֨יָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> Now the time יְמֵ֖י <WH3117> [was] the time בִּכּוּרֵ֥י <WH1061> of the firstripe עֲנָבִֽים׃ <WH6025> grapes

וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> So they went up וַיָּתֻ֣רוּ <WH8446> and searched אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land מִמִּדְבַּר־ <WH4057> from the wilderness צִ֥ן <WH6790> of Zin עַד־ <WH5704> far רְחֹ֖ב <WH7340> unto Rehob לְבֹ֥א <WH935> as men come חֲמָֽת׃ <WH2574> to Hamath

וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> And they ascended בַנֶּגֶב֮ <WH5045> by the south וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> and came עַד־ <WH5704> against חֶבְרוֹן֒ <WH2275> unto Hebron וְשָׁ֤ם <WH8033> where אֲחִימַן֙ <WH289> where Ahiman שֵׁשַׁ֣י <WH8344> Sheshai וְתַלְמַ֔י <WH8526> and Talmai יְלִידֵ֖י <WH3211> the children הָעֲנָ֑ק <WH6061> of Anak וְחֶבְר֗וֹן <WH2275> [were] (Now Hebron שֶׁ֤בַע <WH7651> seven שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> years נִבְנְתָ֔ה <WH1129> was built לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before צֹ֥עַן <WH6814> Zoan מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> Egypt

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> And they came עַד־ <WH5704> against נַ֣חַל <WH5158> unto the brook אֶשְׁכֹּ֗ל <WH812> of Eshcol וַיִּכְרְת֨וּ <WH3772> and cut down מִשָּׁ֤ם <WH8033> there זְמוֹרָה֙ <WH2156> from thence a branch וְאֶשְׁכּ֤וֹל <WH811> cluster עֲנָבִים֙ <WH6025> of grapes אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> with one וַיִּשָּׂאֻ֥הוּ <WH5375> and they bare בַמּ֖וֹט <WH4132> upon a staff בִּשְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> it between two וּמִן־ <WH4480> some הָרִמֹּנִ֖ים <WH7416> and [they brought] of the pomegranates וּמִן־ <WH4480> some הַתְּאֵנִֽים׃ <WH8384> and of the figs

לַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> The place הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he קָרָ֖א <WH7121> was called נַ֣חַל <WH5158> the brook אֶשְׁכּ֑וֹל <WH812> Eshcol עַ֚ל <WH5921> because אֹד֣וֹת <WH182> because of הָֽאֶשְׁכּ֔וֹל <WH811> the cluster of grapes אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which כָּרְת֥וּ <WH3772> cut down מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> which the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> And they returned מִתּ֣וּר <WH8446> from searching הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִקֵּ֖ץ <WH7093> after אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> days

וַיֵּלְכ֡וּ <WH1980> proceeded וַיָּבֹאוּ֩ <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֨ה <WH4872> to Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> and to Aaron וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲדַ֧ת <WH5712> and to all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> in מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> unto the wilderness פָּארָ֖ן <WH6290> of Paran קָדֵ֑שָׁה <WH6946> to Kadesh וַיָּשִׁ֨יבוּ <WH7725> and brought back אוֹתָ֤ם <WH853> דָּבָר֙ <WH1697> word וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> unto them and unto all the congregation וַיַּרְא֖וּם <WH7200> and shewed אֶת־ <WH853> פְּרִ֥י <WH6529> them the fruit הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וַיְסַפְּרוּ־ <WH5608> And they told לוֹ֙ וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> him and said בָּ֕אנוּ <WH935> We came אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> where שְׁלַחְתָּ֑נוּ <WH7971> whither thou sentest וְ֠גַם <WH1571> certainly זָבַ֨ת <WH2100> us and surely it floweth חָלָ֥ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבַ֛שׁ <WH1706> and honey הִ֖וא <WH1931> he וְזֶה־ <WH2088> and this פִּרְיָֽהּ׃ <WH6529> and this [is] the fruit

אֶ֚פֶס <WH657> Nevertheless כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עַ֣ז <WH5794> [be] strong הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people הַיֹּשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> that dwell בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the land וְהֶֽעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> and the cities בְּצֻר֤וֹת <WH1219> [are] walled גְּדֹלֹת֙ <WH1419> great מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> [and] very וְגַם־ <WH1571> and moreover יְלִדֵ֥י <WH3211> the children הָֽעֲנָ֖ק <WH6061> of Anak רָאִ֥ינוּ <WH7200> and moreover we saw שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

עֲמָלֵ֥ק <WH6002> The Amalekites יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land הַנֶּ֑גֶב <WH5045> of the south וְ֠הַֽחִתִּי <WH2850> and the Hittites וְהַיְבוּסִ֤י <WH2983> and the Jebusites וְהָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <WH567> and the Amorites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> dwell בָּהָ֔ר <WH2022> in the mountains וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> and the Canaanites יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> dwell עַל־ <WH5921> by הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> by the sea וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and by יַ֥ד <WH3027> and by the coast הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> of Jordan

וַיַּ֧הַס <WH2013> stilled כָּלֵ֛ב <WH3612> And Caleb אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people אֶל־ <WH413> before מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> before Moses וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said עָלֹ֤ה <WH5927> Let us go up נַעֲלֶה֙ <WH5927> at once וְיָרַ֣שְׁנוּ <WH3423> and possess אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָכ֥וֹל <WH3201> it for we are well able נוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> to overcome לָֽהּ׃

וְהָ֨אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <WH376> the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עָל֤וּ <WH5927> that went up עִמּוֹ֙ <WH5973> with אָֽמְר֔וּ <WH559> with him said לֹ֥א <WH3808> are not נוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> We be not able לַעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> to go up אֶל־ <WH413> against הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> against the people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חָזָ֥ק <WH2389> for they [are] stronger ה֖וּא <WH1931> they מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> are too

וַיּוֹצִ֜יאוּ <WH3318> And they brought up דִּבַּ֤ת <WH1681> an evil report הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תָּר֣וּ <WH8446> which they had searched אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הָאָ֡רֶץ <WH776> The land אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which עָבַ֨רְנוּ <WH5674> through which we have gone בָ֜הּ לָת֣וּר <WH8446> to search אֹתָ֗הּ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> it [is] a land אֹכֶ֤לֶת <WH398> that eateth up יוֹשְׁבֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH3427> the inhabitants הִ֔וא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> thereof and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom רָאִ֥ינוּ <WH7200> that we saw בְתוֹכָ֖הּ <WH8432> in it אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> are men מִדּֽוֹת׃ <WH4060> of a great stature

וְשָׁ֣ם <WH8033> There רָאִ֗ינוּ <WH7200> And there we saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּפִילִ֛ים <WH5303> the giants בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons עֲנָ֖ק <WH6061> of Anak מִן־ <WH4480> at הַנְּפִלִ֑ים <WH5303> [which come] of the giants וַנְּהִ֤י <WH1961> become בְעֵינֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5869> and we were in our own sight כַּֽחֲגָבִ֔ים <WH2284> as grasshoppers וְכֵ֥ן <WH3651> and so הָיִ֖ינוּ <WH1961> were in בְּעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> and so we were in their sight
